text: is a Japanese actress and model. ==Biography== Komatsu was born in Tokyo and brought up in Yamanashi. She started modeling at 12. She has been a House Ambassador for Chanel since 2015. ==Filmography== ===Film=== {|class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Year ! Title ! Role !
